Description: This chart will show the trend of vehicle prices over the years.
goal: To analyze how vehicle prices have changed over the years.

Description: This chart will display the average mileage for each brand.
goal: To compare the average mileage of vehicles across different brands.

Description: This chart will show the distribution of engine sizes across different fuel types.
goal: To visualize how engine sizes vary among different fuel types.

Description: This chart will display the distribution of transmission types across different brands.
goal: To compare the distribution of transmission types among different brands.

Description: This chart will show the average price of vehicles for each fuel type.
goal: To analyze the average price of vehicles based on fuel type.

Description: This chart will display the distribution of the number of doors in the vehicles.
goal: To show the proportion of vehicles with different numbers of doors.

Description: This chart will show the distribution of the number of previous owners of the vehicles.
goal: To visualize the distribution of vehicles based on the number of previous owners.
